name: Pong (itch) (Dyn00)
description:
A simple 2-player offline pong game.

Controls:

  • Player 1:  W and S
  • Player 2: Up and Down Arrows

I challenged myself to make a game in under 1 hour, and decided to settle with a pong game. I completed this game with only 24 seconds remaining, couldn't even do a title screen. When you play, you decide to what score you're going to play, as I did not have enough time to implement this feature. I apologize if you do not like the game, as I am still learning the construct 3 engine.

IF YOU ARE GETTING A BLACK SCREEN, AVOID USING FIREFOX
I am not sure why this error is happening.
